Name: StageX
About the game: StageX helps you to create scene of the future movie with simple and initiative tools because it is based on the principle of instinct learning. You just start to create your own movie as if you were on a set, and it doesnâ€™t matter what exactly you make: a cartoon or a movie. Share the result with colleagues and stakeholders with the help of export previz tool. Get your movie or fbx format scene out there, then sit back and take all the credit. Get high-fidelity in under 5 minutes. Upload your 3d files and add animation, lighting, and VFX to transform your static scene into full animation movie.
